title: Baltimore National Heritage Area: Park Home
body: Experience the Heart of the Chesapeake  For nearly three centuries, Baltimore has stood as a center of commerce and culture for the Chesapeake Bay. The city has seen the incredible transformation of American identity, shaped by war, prosperity, and struggles for freedom and civil rights. Visit www.explorebaltimore.org to experience the places and people that shaped the nation and forged the American identity.              Plan Your Visit   Learn what to do and where to go when you visit!
